title: Mobile-Based Blended Science Learning Design

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic scientific concepts and proficiency in fundamental digital device usage
context.additional_context: A flipped learning course operating in a smartphone-centric limited-technology environment. Learning progresses via LMS and mobile app integration without real-time video classes.

learning_goals: Independently perform the scientific inquiry process three or more times using mobile learning tools.
Improve understanding of scientific concepts by utilizing at least 80% of multimedia resources provided in the mobile app integrated with the LMS.
Enhance collaborative problem-solving skills by conducting five or more peer evaluations and feedback sessions in a blended learning environment.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
